Detailed Description

cvmx_dfa_ddr2_addr

DFA_DDR2_ADDR = DFA DDR2 fclk-domain Memory Address Config Register

Description: The following registers are used to compose the DFA's DDR2 address into ROW/COL/BNK etc.
